pages.text: $(mod)Soul Shards$() allows you to quickly and easily spawn a large amount of mobs automatically.$(br2)First, kill any mob while holding a Soul Shard in your offhand to absorb that mob's soul to the Shard.
Place Glowstone, place 4 $(n)normal$() Blocks of Quartz around it, then place Obsidian in the corners.$(br2)Use a Diamond on the Glowstone in the center to craft the Soul Shard.

The $(item)Vile Sword$() will give the Shard an extra soul per kill, as does each level of the $(item)Soul Stealer$() enchantment.$(br2)You can use a Soul Shard on a Spawner that spawns the Shard's mob, and it will add 200 souls to the Shard.

Insert your Shard into a $(item)Soul Cage$() to make it spawn mobs.$(br2)Higher tier Shards work faster and have more features:$(li)Tier 3 does not need the player nearby$(li)Tier 4 does not need low light$(li)Tier 5 can be disabled with Redstone

You can see how many souls are required for each tier in REI.$(br2)In this pack, each tier adds +1 to the amount spawned (starting at 1).$(br2)Each tier also removes several seconds from the delay between waves.
